name: Jones Morgan
description: I’m down to earth, honest, sincere, compassionate person with very positive attitude in all aspects of life, independent, passionate about life, my job, my family and ready to find that special woman that will make me happy or I would say Happier I think I deserve a good, honest and sincere woman that knows what she wants, that is trustworthy, faithful, sensitive,compassionate, that can win my heart, love and respect for good! Its very hard for me to pick out specificity what I personally look for in a women when there are so many out there. I do not smoke, drink socially. I am a very simple, easy going personality, caring, compassionate man.
